'''Murder Music''' is a term coined by [[homosexual]]-rights activist [[Peter Tatchell]] to describe the [[homophobic]] work of certain [[Jamaican]] musicians, primarily [[Dancehall]] and [[Ragga]] artistes.
Tatchell, and organizations such as [[Human Rights Watch]], have accused [[Beenie Man]], [[Elephant Man]], and [[Buju Banton]] and others promoting homophobic violence through their music.
